alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 3:14PM EST until January 17 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 degrees. * WHERE...Inland Volusia, Lake, Western Orange, and Seminole Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For Orange County, very cold wind chills are mainly expected in the western and northern portions of the county, west of I-4 and the Orlando Metro Area.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and the wind will combine to create low wind chills. Make sure you dress appropriately for the cold weather, including a coat, a hat and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole; Southern Lake County
